title: Why Do Airlines Still Struggle with Order Management?
excerpt: E-commerce mastered order management years ago. Why are airlines still catching up? Ann Cederhall explores the gap and the path forward.
author: Retailaer
content:
From our reading list: Ann Cederhall asks the question we've been asking for years.

Why do airlines still struggle with order management when e-commerce mastered it years ago? Legacy PNR systems and outdated protocols are part of it—but NDC alone doesn't constitute true personalisation or retailing capability either.

Ann's pragmatic, real-world perspective cuts through the theoretical frameworks to show what actually works.
